snippets.name: Country Conditions Research
snippets.html:
I researched and summarized country conditions for the country to support the claim.

I summarized relevant background, human rights reporting, and corroborating evidence needs.

snippets.name: Expert Declaration Requested
snippets.html:
I requested an expert declaration.

{key:tab}

I identified the expert’s scope, deadlines, and materials needed for review.

snippets.name: Criminal-Immigration Analysis Memorandum
snippets.html:
I drafted a memorandum analyzing immigration consequences of criminal issues.

{key:tab}

I reviewed records, applied the relevant statutory and case law framework, and reached preliminary conclusions.

snippets.name: Waiver Eligibility Research
snippets.html:
I researched eligibility for an immigration waiver.

{key:tab}

I identified statutory criteria, hardship factors, and evidentiary requirements.

snippets.name: Hardship Evidence Compiled
snippets.html:
I compiled hardship evidence.

{key:tab}

I collected medical, educational, and financial documentation and organized exhibits.

snippets.name: Medical Documentation Requested
snippets.html:
I requested medical records for evidentiary use.

{key:tab}

I sent instructions for record release and identified specific items needed.

snippets.name: Economic Impact Evidence Compiled
snippets.html:
I compiled economic impact evidence.

{key:tab}

I assembled employment, tax, and financial records to support the relief request.

snippets.name: Psychological Evaluation Ordered
snippets.html:
I arranged for a psychological evaluation.

{key:tab}

I coordinated with the evaluator, provided background materials, and scheduled the assessment.

snippets.name: Case Law Update Reviewed
snippets.html:
I reviewed recent case law updates.

{key:tab}

I summarized holdings relevant to the case strategy and noted citations for future briefing.

snippets.name: Legal Memorandum Drafted
snippets.html:
I drafted a legal memorandum on case issues.

{key:tab}

I analyzed statutes, regulations, and precedent to support the requested relief.
